document_data.mainbody:
azti was a secluded Payitlan town on the shores of the Gulf of Cordell.
Mazti was a minor town with population somewhere between 5,000 and 15,000 Mazticans. The town stood to the west of Ulatos, encircled by the thick Bomak Jungle. Maztis closest western neighbor was the Pezelac town of Palenqi.
